actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon uses its Frightful Presence. It then makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. It can replace its Bite attack with a use of Weakening Breath, if available.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 19 (2d10+8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 15 (2d6+8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 17 (2d8+8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 18 WIS save or be frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's save is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 DEX save, taking 71 (13d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Weakening Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: As the **gold dragon wyrmling**, except it is a 60-foot cone, and the save DC is 21.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Golden Splendor
special_abilities.desc: As the **young gold dragon**, except it affects creatures within 20 feet of the dragon, and the save DC is 21.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the dragon fails a save, it can choose to succeed instead.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon automatically detects every creature and trap within 30 feet of it, pinpointing the current location of each.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Elemental Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon roars at up to two creatures of its choice within 120 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 18 CHA save or be vulnerable to fire damage until the end of its next turn. A target resistant to fire damage isn't resistant to it for the duration. A target immune to fire damage is still immune to it, even if the target fails the save.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 22 DEX save or take 15 (2d6+8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
